content: perfect for a first project this squishy cowl starts garter stitch worked flat then joined in the round for an easy transition from one new skill to the next knit on big needles this quick cowl makes a great gift experience level * beginner materials * woolstok north super bulky 100% fine highland wool 150g/107yds 1 hank a 1 hank b * stitch marker * tapestry needle finished measurments * circumference 28½ * height 13 color shown * gravel road no 4302 * wild thyme no 4306
